articles.author: Roopa Radhakrishnan
articles.title: Prabhas reacts to Anushka Shetty's Miss Shetty Mr Polishetty trailer; here's what he has to say - PINKVILLA
articles.description: Prabhas Shared Via His Instagram Story That He Could Not Stop Laughing After Watching The Trailer For Anushka Shetty’s Miss Shetty Mr Polishetty.
articles.content: The trailer for Miss Shetty Mr Polishetty, starring Anushka Shetty and Naveen Polishetty, has just been released. Netizens have given the trailer a thumbs up. Soon after the trailer came out, one of … [+2220 chars]
